root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 16-5-2, translated into en
root.data: The indicator reflects equal access to public services and proper functioning of the economy. When administrative bribery becomes the repeated experience of large segments of people and businesses, it has long-term negative effects on the rule of law, democratic processes and justice. This indicator provides an objective measure of corruption, a yardstick to track progress in the fight against corruption
